title: Discord Bots in OpenClaw: A Friendly Beginner's Guide
summary: A beginner-friendly walkthrough of Discord basics, why bots are easy there, and how to wire a Discord bot into OpenClaw.

title: WhatsApp vs Telegram: Understanding Multi-Agent Architecture in OpenClaw
summary: How multi-agent setups differ across WhatsApp and Telegram, with practical guidance for choosing the right architecture.
